channel.title: Robotscape Reborn 317
channel.description:
I have decided to continue my server Robotscape. My server is probably at the end of the list and I have no idea why. I lost all of my players due to a client glitch from the previous version that has been fixed. This server is a project insanity (PI) 317 server being hosted on my vps. [url=http://robotscape.net/Downloads/Release.zip]Client Download[/url]
[b]My Server Has:[/b]
-Summoning pets - from frozen-world v2 -New item images and animations -602 animations -634 items -Dungeoneering items -PK supplies tab to buy food and armour -Donator zone -Real GWD -Lots of bosses - frozen-world v2 -prestige (still being coded) And much more.
I am making a development team to help me get this server back to the top (or at least the 1st or 2nd page) of the list. I am looking for a few people to help with some things. Look below and tell me what you want to help with.
[b]Prestige[/b] I need someone to help me make a command that when typed ::prestige you will +1 a prestige and reset all combat skills. I need some people to make some items and places only be able to be accessed with a certain prestige.
[b]Map Pack[/b] Yes I am making a map pack sort of. I am not releasing to much about this to the public so for a full list please ask me by emailing me at info@robotscape.net. I need someone to help add NPC's and rare drops etc.
[b]NPC Fixing[/b] Some NPC's are messed up. All of the skywyrms are the wrong npc. For example the ice skywyrm is a tzhaar guy etc.
[b]Other normal coding[/b] Want to help with some other part of the server?Email me: info@robotscape.net.
To apply for something post below or post on our forums. To sign up copy and paste the application template for developing. [url=http://www.robotscape.net/smf/index.php?topic=2.0]To visit that thread, click here.[/url]
[b]Links[/b]
[url=http://robotscape.net/Downloads/Release.zip]Client[/url] [url=http://www.robotscape.net/smf/index.php?topic=2.0]Application Template[/url]

item.title: Robotscape Reborn 317
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:401083”]Prestige = Very easy.
map pack = Wtf?
NPC Fixing = 602 npc id list.

For the love of god don’t fucking use DSPK / Hybrid PvP![/quote]

NPC fixing is a cache loading issue I am pretty sure. I have the right ID’s but the NPC image that is loading is not correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Robotscape Reborn 317
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Gahhh, I understand now.

Read full topic

Gimmie source and client and it will be done in 30 minutes ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Robotscape Reborn 317
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

I have decided to continue my server Robotscape. My server is probably at the end of the list and I have no idea why. I lost all of my players due to a client glitch from the previous version that has been fixed. This server is a project insanity (PI) 317 server being hosted on my vps. Client Download

My Server Has:

-Summoning pets - from frozen-world v2
-New item images and animations
-602 animations
-634 items
-Dungeoneering items
-PK supplies tab to buy food and armour
-Donator zone
-Real GWD
-Lots of bosses - frozen-world v2
-prestige (still being coded)
And much more.

I am making a development team to help me get this server back to the top (or at least the 1st or 2nd page) of the list. I am looking for a few people to help with some things. Look below and tell me what you want to help with.

Prestige
I need someone to help me make a command that when typed ::prestige you will +1 a prestige and reset all combat skills.
I need some people to make some items and places only be able to be accessed with a certain prestige.

Map Pack
Yes I am making a map pack sort of. I am not releasing to much about this to the public so for a full list please ask me by emailing me at info@robotscape.net.
I need someone to help add NPC’s and rare drops etc.

NPC Fixing
Some NPC’s are messed up. All of the skywyrms are the wrong npc. For example the ice skywyrm is a tzhaar guy etc.

Other normal coding
Want to help with some other part of the server?Email me: info@robotscape.net.

To apply for something post below or post on our forums. To sign up copy and paste the application template for developing. To visit that thread, click here.
